Block.Text: {C1}{Char:1005}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}This is a place where you pan for {Color:32}gold{Color:33} in the waters of the river. You'll need to be {Color:32}powerful{Color:33} to scoop that water up, mind! I do hope you strike it lucky and go home with some {Color:32}gold{Color:33} to show for your efforts!{End}
{C1}{Char:1005}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Now then, let's start panning for {Color:32}gold{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}{Char:1005}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Good day, newcomer! Would you like me to tell you how to make use of this {Color:32}Open-Pit Mine{Color:33}?{End}
{C1}{Char:1005}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Welcome! I do believe this is your first time here? Would you like me to tell you how {Color:32}mining{Color:33} works?{End}
{C1}{Char:1005}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You're leaving? Do be sure to come back again sometime!{End}
{C1}{Char:1007}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hey, grab those {Color:32}goggles{Color:33} and help me pan for gold, will ya? If we hit the jackpot, we'll split it in half!{End}
{C1}{Char:1007}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hey, grab that {Color:32}sieve{Color:33} and help me pan for gold, will ya? If we hit the jackpot, we can split it, fifty-fifty!{End}
{C1}{Char:1007}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hey, grab that {Color:32}pump{Color:33} and help me pan for gold, will ya? If we hit the jackpot, we can split it, fifty-fifty!{End}
{C1}{Char:1006}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hey there! Use that {Color:32}spade{Color:33} to help me dig for treasure, will ya? We'll be rich before you know it!{End}
{C1}{Char:1006}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hey there! Use that {Color:32}pickaxe{Color:33} to help me search for treasure, will ya? We'll be rich before you know it!{End}
{C1}{Char:1006}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hey there! Use that {Color:32}drill{Color:33} to help me search for treasure, will ya? We'll be rich before you know it!{End}

{C1}{Char:1008}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You there! Yes, you! Take my place for a moment, and use that {Color:32}spade{Color:33} to dig for gold, will you? I'll give you a fair share of anything we find! You can trust me!{End}

{C1}{Char:1008}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You there! Yes, you! Take my place for a moment, and use that {Color:32}pickaxe{Color:33} to dig for gold, will you? I'll give you a fair share of anything we find! You can trust me!{End}

{C1}{Char:1008}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You there! Yes, you! Take my place for a moment, and use that {Color:32}drill{Color:33} to dig for gold, will you? I'll give you a fair share of anything we find! You can trust me!{End}
{C1}{Char:1006}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hey there! Pick up those {Color:32}gloves{Color:33}, and give me a hand digging, will ya? We'll be rich before we know it!{End}
{C1}{Char:1006}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hey there! Pick up that {Color:32}shovel{Color:33}, and give me a hand digging, will ya? We'll be rich before we know it!{End}
{C1}{Char:1006}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hey there! Pick up that {Color:32}hammer{Color:33}, and give me a hand cracking these rocks, will ya? We'll be rich before we know it!{End}
{C1}{Char:1007}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hey, thanks! You won't regret this!{End}
{C1}{Char:1006}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Great, thanks!{End}
{C1}{Char:1008}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Splendid! Now, get digging!{End}
{C1}{Char:1006}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Great, thanks!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The Warrior tried using the item.{End}
{C1}{Char:1007}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh. Never mind, then.{End}
{C1}{Char:1006}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Really? I'm not trying to trick you, honest...{End}
{C1}{Char:1008}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}How insufferably rude!{End}
{C1}{Char:1006}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Really? You don't have to be so cold...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}{Attack}{C1} gold acquired.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}A |02,64,64{C1} is glittering... {C1}Total gold acquired: {Attack}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1007}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Fantastic! Thanks a lot!{End}
{C1}{Char:1006}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Good job! We hit the jackpot!{End}
{C1}{Char:1008}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Magnificent work! I was right to choose you!{End}
{C1}{Char:1006}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Good job! We hit the jackpot!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The tool broke. All the gold has been lost.{End}
{C1}{Char:1007}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I-It broke?! Uhh... I'm sorry...{End}
{C1}{Char:1006}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hey! What do you think you're doing?!{End}
{C1}{Char:1008}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh, my! This is a catastrophe! I should never have trusted you!{End}
{C1}{Char:1006}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oi! What are you doing?!{End}
{C1}{Char:1005}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hmm? Hey, look! {Color:31}Meowth{Color:33} seems to like it here!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}More gold has been mysteriously acquired! {C1}Total gold acquired: {Attack}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1020}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hi! Welcome! Press that button if you want to summon some Pokémon! Go on!{End}
{C1}{Char:1021}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hello there! If you want to summon some Pokémon, please press that button!{End}
{C1}{Char:1020}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Greetings! Welcome to my {Color:32}Power Plant{Color:33}! So... Do you need me to explain what this {Color:32}Power Plant{Color:33} does?{End}

{C1}{Char:1020}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Very well! This place produces a strange energy, see―one that summons wild Pokémon to the area for a period of one month! You should use the Power Plant if you want to strengthen your {Color:32}link{Color:33} with your partner Pokémon or if you want to summon some shy Pokémon that are difficult to meet! Use it {Color:32}wisely{Color:33}, okay?{End}

{C1}{Char:1020}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh, and one more thing, before I forget! After the Power Plant's been used, you can't use it again until it's been recharged! Okay? All right! Let's do this! Press that button!{End}
{C1}{Char:1020}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Well then! There's no need to be shy! Press that button!{End}
{C1}{Char:1021}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Well, it looks like it's your first visit here. Would you like me to explain how this {Color:32}Windmill{Color:33} works?{End}

{C1}{Char:1021}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}This Windmill generates a mysterious allure that summons Pokémon to the area for a period of one month. You should use it when you want to strengthen your {Color:32}link{Color:33} with a partner Pokémon or when you want to meet an especially elusive Pokémon. They say the {Color:32}wisest{Color:33} Warriors in the land are those who know the power of the Windmill.{End}

{C1}{Char:1021}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Just remember that the Windmill needs to recharge for a while after it's been used, meaning it can't be used. Now, press that button to make the Pokémon come running!{End}
{C1}{Char:1021}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}All right, press that button to make the Pokémon come running!{End}
{C1}{Char:1020}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}What's that you say? You've had enough? Well...all right! Come back again sometime.{End}
{C1}{Char:1021}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Are you calling it a day? Very well. Do come back again, though!{End}

{C1}{Char:1020}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Wait just a moment! See that other button over there? That'll generate even more power and summon even more Pokémon to the area! ...Although it doesn't always work... What do you say? Want to give it a go?{End}

{C1}{Char:1021}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh! I nearly forgot. I've tried modifying the Windmill so that it generates more power and summons even more Pokémon to the area! It's still a work in progress, but do you fancy giving it a try?{End}

{C1}{Char:1020}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}This is a modification I made myself―you'd better brace yourself for massive crowds of Pokémon! Massive crowds, I'm telling you! All right! Press that button!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The button has been pressed...{End}
{C1}{Char:1021}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I've spent ages making this modification... I can't wait to see it in action!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The power to attract Pokémon has increased.{End}
{C1}{Char:1020}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}What?! You're looking this gift horse in the mouth?! Well, fine. Stick to the ordinary button if that's what you want.{End}
{C1}{Char:1021}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh. That's a shame. Maybe you can try it next time you visit...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Large numbers of Pokémon are gathering in {Area}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1020}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Marvelous! Look at all these Pokémon! I hope you're grateful!{End}
{C1}{Char:1021}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh my! What a success! It looks like huge crowds of Pokémon are gathering in the area.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The machine broke. No Pokémon have come to the area.{End}
{C1}{Char:1020}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}It... It broke?! This is all your fault! You must have pressed the button too hard!{End}
{C1}{Char:1021}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh no! It didn't work! Why does this keep happening to me...? My wife's going to be furious...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon are gathering in {Area}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1039}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I bring news! {Poke}{C1} have been spotted in {Area}{C1}! These Pokémon are almost never seen in Ransei!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}{Poke}{C1} have appeared in {Area}{C1}.{End}

{C1}{Char:1039}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I bring news, |02,50,65{C1}! {Poke}{C1} have been seen in {Area}{C1}! I recommend you send forces to {Color:32}link{Color:33} with one of them before they go away again!{End}

{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The Pokémon that have appeared as a result of your entering the password will only be around for this month, so it is recommended that you save your game now. Once you save, you will not be able to use the password again.{End}
{C1}{Char:1043}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Welcome! What can I do for you today?{End}
{C1}{Char:1044}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hi there! How can I help you?{End}
{C1}{Char:1043}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Welcome! This is your first time here, isn't it? Shall I tell you how things work here at the {Color:32}Shop{Color:33}?{End}

{C1}{Char:1043}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}This is the place to come if you want to buy or sell {Color:32}items{Color:33}. {Color:32}Item{Color:33} prices are different for every customer, and things are usually a bit cheaper for {Color:32}charismatic{Color:33} people, I must admit. All right, happy shopping!{End}
{C1}{Char:1043}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Very well. Happy shopping!{End}
{C1}{Char:1044}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hi there! Thanks for visiting our {Color:32}Shop{Color:33}! How about I give you a quick rundown of what we do here?{End}

{C1}{Char:1044}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Here at the Shop, you can buy and sell all sorts of different {Color:32}items{Color:33}! The prices are different for every customer, but {Color:32}items{Color:33} are always cheaper for those who are a little {Color:32}charismatic{Color:33}. Got all that? Great! Have fun shopping!{End}
{C1}{Char:1044}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}All right, then. Have fun shopping!{End}
{C1}{Char:1043}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}What'll it be today?{End}
{C1}{Char:1044}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}So, what'll it be?{End}
{C1}{Char:1043}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}We've got new items in stock! Take a look!{End}
{C1}{Char:1044}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Why don't you take a look at our new stock?{End}
{C1}{Char:1043}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Thank you!{End}
{C1}{Char:1044}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hey, thanks very much!{End}
{C1}{Char:1043}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}What would you like to sell?{End}
{C1}{Char:1044}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Okay! So what are you selling?{End}
{C1}{Char:1043}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}How many would you like to sell?{End}
{C1}{Char:1044}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}How many are you selling?{End}
{C1}{Char:1043}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Thank you very much!{End}
{C1}{Char:1044}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Thanks!{End}
{C1}{Char:1043}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Thank you for visiting our Shop!{End}
{C1}{Char:1044}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hey, thanks for visiting! Come again!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Sell the item |02,64,64{C1} x {Turns}{C1}?{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Buy the item |02,64,64{C1} x {Turns}{C1}?{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Equip the item |02,64,64{C1}?{End}
{C1}{Char:1043}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}How many would you like to buy?{End}
{C1}{Char:1044}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Okay! So how many are you buying?{End}
{C1}{Char:1043}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh, I nearly forgot. You can change your {Color:32}items{Color:33} by selecting a castle and choosing {Color:32}Equip{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1044}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh! I clean forgot. To change your {Color:32}items{Color:33}, go to a castle and select {Color:32}Equip{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Welcome, friend! Would you like to change your Pokémon's {Color:32}Abilities{Color:33}?{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Welcome, friend! First time here, is it? How about I give you a quick explanation of what we do here, eh?{End}

{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}This is where you come to change your Pokémon's {Color:32}Abilities{Color:33}. You probably know that even Pokémon of the same type can have different {Color:32}Abilities{Color:33}, right? Well, did you know that you can actually change these {Color:32}Abilities{Color:33}? Of course, it'll cost you a little bit of {Color:32}gold{Color:33}...{End}

{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Changing a Pokémon's {Color:32}Abilities{Color:33} can have a major effect on their performance in battle, so I'd suggest trying a variety of different ones. All right then, which new {Color:32}Ability{Color:33} would you like to try?{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}All right then, which new {Color:32}Ability{Color:33} would you like to try?{End}
{C1}{Char:1054}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Welcome. Here to change your Pokémon's {Color:32}Abilities{Color:33}, are you?{End}
{C1}{Char:1054}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh, hello there. I see that it's your first time. I suppose I'd better give you an explanation of what goes on here?{End}

{C1}{Char:1054}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Well, this is where you come to change your Pokémon's {Color:32}Abilities{Color:33}. Even Pokémon of the same type can have different {Color:32}Abilities{Color:33}, of course, and these {Color:32}Abilities{Color:33} can be changed to your liking here. And all for a very reasonable amount of {Color:32}gold{Color:33}.{End}

{C1}{Char:1054}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Changing a Pokémon's {Color:32}Abilities{Color:33} has an effect on their performance in battle, so I'd strongly recommend trying at least a couple of different ones. Now then, are you ready to choose a new {Color:32}Ability{Color:33}?{End}
{C1}{Char:1054}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Now then, are you ready to choose a new {Color:32}Ability{Color:33}?{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Ground-type attacks won't affect Pokémon with this Ability.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability are able to climb high cliffs.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability are good at moving on water.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability are good at moving on ice.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability can use super strength to push an attacking opponent far away.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability are able to fight regardless of what Abilities their opponent may have.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability are able to fight regardless of what Abilities their opponent may have.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability are able to fight regardless of what Abilities their opponent may have.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability do much more damage when inflicting a critical hit on their enemy.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability take less damage from their opponents' supereffective attacks.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability never take critical hits from the enemy.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability never take critical hits from the enemy.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability survive with 1 HP, even when hit with an instant-knockout attack.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability will ignore any stat changes by their enemy and inflict and receive the normal amount of damage.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability are stronger against Fire-type and Ice-type attacks.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability will not become paralyzed.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability will not become poisoned.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability will not become confused.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability will not flinch.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The stats of Pokémon with this Ability will not decrease.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The accuracy of Pokémon with this Ability will not decrease.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Being hit by Fire-type moves will increase the Attack of Pokémon with this Ability.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Being hit by Water-type moves will restore the HP of Pokémon with this Ability.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Being hit by Electric-type moves will restore the HP of Pokémon with this Ability.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Being hit by Electric-type moves will improve the Speed of Pokémon with this Ability.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Being hit by Electric-type moves will improve the Attack of Pokémon with this Ability.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability can evade opponents' moves.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability use blades or claws to parry enemy moves.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability use their instincts to swiftly evade enemy moves.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability evade direct attacks and knock their opponents off balance.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability cause damage to opponents who attack them directly.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability poison opponents who attack them directly.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability paralyze opponents who attack them directly.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability burn opponents who attack them directly.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability freeze opponents who attack them directly.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability cause opponents who attack them directly to flinch.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The Attack of Pokémon with this Ability will increase when they are reduced to 1/3 of their max HP.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The Attack of Pokémon with this Ability will increase when they are reduced to 1/3 of their max HP.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The Attack of Pokémon with this Ability will increase when they are reduced to 1/3 of their max HP.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The Attack of Pokémon with this Ability will increase when they are reduced to 1/3 of their max HP.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The Attack of Pokémon with this Ability will improve when they are suffering from a status ailment.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The Attack and Defense of Pokémon with this Ability will improve when they are suffering from a status ailment.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The Speed of Pokémon with this Ability will increase when they flinch.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Being hit by Dark-type moves will increase the Attack of Pokémon with this Ability.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The HP of Pokémon with this Ability will be restored when they are asleep.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}When they fall below 1/3 of their max HP, Pokémon with this Ability will fall asleep and then begin to recover HP.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The Attack and HP of Pokémon with this Ability will increase when they are reduced to 1/3 of their max HP.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The HP of Pokémon with this Ability will be restored when they are standing in fire.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The HP of Pokémon with this Ability will be restored when they are standing in water.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The HP of Pokémon with this Ability will be restored when they are standing on grass.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The HP of Pokémon with this Ability will be restored when they are standing on sand or soil.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The HP of Pokémon with this Ability will be restored when they are standing on magma, sand, or soil.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability restore the HP of nearby allies.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The HP of Pokémon with this Ability will be restored every turn.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The HP of Pokémon with this Ability will be restored when they wait at the end of a turn.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability will recover naturally from status ailments.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability will cure the status ailments of the ally in the square next to them.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability will cure the status ailments of the ally in the square next to them.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability will take advantage of chaos on the battlefield to attack adjacent enemies.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability absorb the HP of enemies in the square next to them.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability protect allies in the squares next to them by taking enemy attacks in their place.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The Attack and Defense of Pokémon with this Ability will increase when your army is struggling.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The Attack and Defense of Pokémon with this Ability will increase when all their allies have been defeated.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The moves of Pokémon with this Ability are guaranteed to hit, as are the moves of enemies against them.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability find it easier to evade enemy moves when in their favorite terrain.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The moves of Pokémon with this Ability are more powerful when they are used at the very start of a turn.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The farther Pokémon with this Ability move, the more their Attack will increase.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The more Electric-type Pokémon that are together, the more the Attack of Pokémon with this Ability will increase.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The Defense of Pokémon with this Ability will improve when they are in grassy terrain.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability have improved accuracy.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The effectiveness of stat changes is doubled for Pokémon with this Ability.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The Attack of Pokémon with this Ability is increased for 1 turn whenever they defeat an enemy.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability are able to have a 2nd turn immediately when they defeat an enemy.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability send nearby enemies to sleep.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability send nearby enemies to sleep.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability send nearby enemies to sleep for a long time.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability lower nearby enemies' Attack.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability lower nearby enemies' Speed.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability lower nearby enemies' accuracy.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability increase nearby allies' {Color:32}Energy{Color:33} levels.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability increase nearby allies' Defense.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability pick up more gold.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability pick up a surprisingly large amount of gold.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability explode when they faint, causing damage to those nearby.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability begin the battle disguised as an ally Pokémon.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability have the Mountaineer, Instinct, and Life Force Abilities at the same time.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability benefit from the effects of Warrior Skills no matter where they are.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability render the enemy in the square next to them incapable of moving.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability can chop down trees with their moves.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability can smash rocks with their moves.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon with this Ability have increased Range when there are no other Pokémon within three squares.{End}
